item.title: MySql Check variables
item.description: determine which charset/collations are available SHOW CHARSET; SHOW COLLATION; check charset SHOW VARIABLES LIKE ‘%character%'; SHOW VARIABLES LIKE ‘%collation%'; set charset (in configure file -> my.

item.title: My First Blog
item.description: This is my first blog This is my first blog, I am going to share some my coding and some technical sharing.

item.title: Outlook 2003 not showing Embedded Images
item.description: Check storage vssadmin list shadowstorage Run to reduce size vssadmin resize shadowstorage /on=c: /for=c: /maxsize=5GB

item.title: Reduce size for System Volume Information
item.description: Deleting the reg key location : HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\11.0\Outlook\Security Key : OutlookSecureTempFolder Fixed the problem.

item.title: Soft Recovery for Exchange 2003 DB
item.description: eseutil /R /L “Log Location” /I E00 (if it has E01, E02), add it.
